meanings.definition: The act of removing mythical elements from a story or belief.
meanings.sent1: The demythologizations of the ancient tale made it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often engage in demythologizations to uncover the truth behind legends.
meanings.sent3: The demythologizations of the ghost story turned it into a simple campfire tale.
meanings.sent4: Her demythologizations of the family history revealed surprising truths.
meanings.sent5: The demythologizations of the folklore made the stories seem more realistic.

meanings.definition: The process of interpreting a myth in a rational or historical way.
meanings.sent1: Through careful demythologizations, the ancient myth was found to have a logical explanation.
meanings.sent2: Historians often use demythologizations to understand the cultural significance of myths.
meanings.sent3: The demythologizations of the fairy tale led to some unexpected conclusions.
meanings.sent4: His demythologizations of the legend shed light on its true origins.
meanings.sent5: The demythologizations of the myth brought a new perspective to the story.
